keywords.display_name: Publications Office of the European Union
keywords.name: Publications Office of the European Union

resources.description:
The dataset contains information on the activity of the Publications Office of the European Union in 2016, based on its Annual Activity Report (AAR). It details the achievements and initiatives taken during the year and the resources used. The performance indicators and data available are grouped into three main categories: key results and progress towards the achievement of objectives, organisational management and financial control, and financial statements.

The AAR is a management report of the Director-General of the Publications Office to the College of Commissioners on the performance of his duties. It is a key component of the accountability chain within the Commission, in which the Director-General takes responsibility for the management of resources, by reference to the objectives and related indicators set out in the Strategic and Management Plans and the efficiency and effectiveness of internal control systems, including an overall assessment of the costs and benefits of controls.

The report is available in English and must be finalised by 31 March each year. The AARs of all Directorates-General of the European Commission are then communicated to the European Parliament, the Council and the European Court of Auditors.
resources.name: Annual Activity Report 2016 of the Publications Office

resources.description: The dataset covers the operating dimension of the Publications Office’s performance in 2016 (how we have delivered?) It presents the state of play as regards achievements in financial management, internal control and other organisational management domains, such as human resource management and information management strategies.
resources.name: Organisational management and internal control: performance tables (Section 2 and Annexes 2 and 10 of the AAR 2016)

resources.description:
The dataset contains the financial statements of the Publications Office for 2016. It includes information on budget implementation, commercial accounting, revenue and income, as well as public procurement contracts.
The financial statements have a standard form for all Directorates-General of the European Commission. In particular, the reporting on the negotiated procedures and waivers of recovery orders involving 100 000 EUR or more, as well as on the compliance with payment time limits, constitutes a legal obligation under the Financial Regulation.
resources.name: Financial statements: annual accounts and financial reports (Annex 3 to the AAR 2016)

resources.description: The dataset covers the policy dimension of the Publications Office’s performance in 2016 (what we have delivered?). It presents the key results and progress towards the achievement of the objectives set in the Strategic Plan 2016-2020 and against the outputs in the Management Plan 2016, which cover the production and publication of legal content, multi-channel dissemination for general publications, structuring of data through formats and metadata or easy accessibility to EU authentic information.
resources.name: Key results and progress towards the achievement of general objectives and specific objectives: performance tables (Section 1 and Annex 12 of the AAR 2016)

resources.description: The reference to the annual activity report is provided for in Article 66(9) of the Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 966/2012.
resources.name: Regulation (EU, Euratom) No 966/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25 October 2012 on the financial rules applicable to the general budget of the Union

resources.description: Annual Activity Reports 2016 of all Directorates-General of the European Commission
resources.name: Annual Activity Reports 2016 of all Directorates-General of the European Commission
